spec_data.Name: lollypop-portal
spec_data.Description:
Lollypop flatpak portal (advanced features for Lollypop).
Lollypop portal dbus service allow Lollypop to launch external
commands (pa-cmd, kid3-cli, ...) through flatpak sandbox.
This service is also used when running without sandbox.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 17 Oct 2017 01:58:05 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
